meanings.sent1: The servicewomen bravely defended their country.
meanings.sent2: Many servicewomen have received medals for their valor.
meanings.sent3: The servicewomen joked about having to do push-ups in the rain.
meanings.sent4: In the battlefield, the servicewomen were the true heroes.
meanings.sent5: The image of the servicewomen in uniform left a lasting impression on the recruits.

meanings.sent1: The servicewomen at the hospital cared for the patients with compassion.
meanings.sent2: The servicewomen in the restaurant ensured all customers were satisfied.
meanings.sent3: The servicewomen organized a charity event to help the community.
meanings.sent4: The servicewomen were like guardian angels, always ready to assist.
meanings.sent5: The servicewomen's dedication to their work was truly inspiring.
